sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {select, Store} from '@ngrx/store'; import { IAppState } from 'store/state/app.state'; import { BehaviorSubject, Observable, Subject } from 'rxjs'; import { selectCartList, selectCartTotal} from 'store/selectors/cart.selector'; import { Cart } from 'src/app/model/cart'; import { DeleteCartItem, GetCartItemAction, GetCartTotalAction } from 'store/actions/cart.action'; import { CartWithProducts } from 'src/app/model/CartWithProducts'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/services/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { item$? : CartWithProducts[] subtotal = Array(); total$? : number; constructor(private store: Store, private cart_service: CartService) { this.store.dispatch(GetCartItemAction()); } ngOnInit(): void { this.getSumPriceCart(); this.getCartList(); this.cart_service.getRefreshCart().subscribe(() =>{ this.store.dispatch(GetCartItemAction()); }) } getCartList (){ this.store.select(selectCartList).subscribe(res => { this.item$ = res; for (let i = 0; i < this.item$.length; i++) { let subtotal = Math.round((this.item$[i].price * this.item$[i].quantity + Number.EPSILON) * 100) / 100; if (subtotal != undefined) { this.subtotal.push(subtotal); } } }); } deleteItem(id : number){ this.store.dispatch(DeleteCartItem({id : id })); } getSumPriceCart (){ this.store.dispatch(GetCartTotalAction()); this.store.select(selectCartTotal).subscribe(res =>{ this.total$ = res; }); } }
